projects.title: WeatherThingy
projects.description: Complete IoT weather monitoring system with ESP32, LoRaWAN connectivity to TTN, Azure SQL Server backend, and real-time .NET MAUI dashboard. Demonstrates full-stack IoT architecture from sensor to visualization.

projects.title: VitalSync
projects.description: ESP32-based fitness wearable with heart rate monitoring, accelerometer tracking, and Flutter mobile app. Features real-time health metrics, workout analysis, and Bluetooth connectivity for seamless data sync.

projects.title: FIFA World Cup Analytics DB
projects.description: Comprehensive SQL Server database with 28 normalized tables covering FIFA World Cup history (2018-2022). Includes complex analytics queries, performance optimization, and data visualization for tournament insights.

projects.title: Baron1898 RTOS
projects.description: Real-Time Operating System simulation implementing semaphore-based resource management and task scheduling. Educational project demonstrating concurrent programming concepts and embedded systems fundamentals.
